          Introduction
          Islam, is one of the most wide spread religions across the
          world. this website will provide a range of information coming
          from trusted muslim sources! hopefully, once you’ve browsed
          through my website you’ll leave it with a lot of
          knowledge🤍.
          ﷽,﷽, “in the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
          ♡
          this is a dua recited before you carry out any action as it
          is said to bless what ever you are doing!!
          Tap on the “importance of Islam” to learn more!
